name: A Story of Adventure and Love
name_original: A Story of Adventure and Love
description:
This is a silly little class project made by Bitsy.

It's a simple story where the hero finally learned that the most important thing was always there. But once you make a decision, there is no turning back.

I made 5 endings for the game (though only two of them really matters.)

Again, it's a simple and silly game that would probably take you 2 minutes. But I hope that you would enjoy it:)
